definition.text: A collection of reusable snippets of text to be reused within the Governance Project.

paragraphs.text: The governance system does all calculations dynamically, in real-time, with every change in the definitions, and computes all the hierarchies loaded in the Current Workspace.

The above means that the calculations that you see from within any given Workspace is a partial calculation within the scope of the Current Workspace only. Definitions, claims, votes, and so on, existing on other workspaces or plugins are not computed.
Participation in this program is incentivized with a Tokens Bonus, meaning you earn tokens just by participating! Read about Tokens Bonus to learn more!
Read about the Community Building Programs to learn how this program calculates Tokens Awarded.
